title: James Eadie (footballer)
text:
James Eadie was a Scottish amateur <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="wing%20half">wing half</a> and <a href="Full%20back%20%28association%20football%29">full back</a> who played in the <a href="Scottish%20Football%20League">Scottish League</a> for <a href="Queen%27s%20Park%20F.C.">Queen's Park</a>.
Personal life.
Eadie had three brothers who each played football – Alexander, David and <a href="William%20Eadie%20%28footballer%29">William</a>.
